data.title: Australia Day
data.text:
Australia Day Achievement Medallions and Lapel Pins are awarded in recognition of exceptional performance in special projects or core duties, by Government departments and agencies, not-for-profit organisations and corporate entities.

The criteria for the presentation of medallions and lapel pins is set by each entity and varies considerably with the common theme of excellence in the workplace. Medallion and Lapel Pin presentations generally take place at events in the lead up to or soon after Australia Day. Recipient names are published on the Australia Day website from mid-February each year.

Australia Day Medallion and Lapel Pin Past Recipients

Download Certificate of Achievement

How to order

Medallions and Lapel Pins can be ordered by completing the form below. Once the order is placed, an email is sent confirming the order has been received. An invoice will then be issued and once paid, your order will be despatched.

Silver Medallions, including a presentation box, can be purchased for $35 each (plus GST).

Bronze Lapel Pins, including a presentation box, can be purchased for $20 each (plus GST).
